description: This tool provides guidance for planning the end of support (EOS) for Windows 10, alongside considerations for transitioning to Windows 11, Windows 365, and Extended Security Updates (ESU). It includes resources and best practices to assist system administrators in managing upgrades efficiently. The implementation of this tool aims to ensure that organizations remain compliant and secure as they navigate changes in operating systems. The details for implementing the transition process can be found in the associated blog post.
